# NSPathCellDelegate

**Protocol**

A set of methods that enable the delegate of a path cell object to customize the Open panel or pop-up menu of a path whose style is set to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPathControl/Style/popUp].

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSPathCellDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Customizing the Open Panel

- **pathCell(_:willDisplay:)**: Implement this method to customize the Open panel shown by a pop-up–style path.

## Customizing the Menu

- **pathCell(_:willPopUp:)**: Implement this method to customize the menu of a pop-up–style path.

## Cells

- **NSPathCell**: The user interface of a path control object.
- **NSPathComponentCell**: A component of a path.
- **NSPathControlItem**

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
